Class DefaultExitHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.krysalis.barcode4j.cli.AbstractExitHandler
      • org.krysalis.barcode4j.cli.DefaultExitHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExitHandler

    public class DefaultExitHandler
extends AbstractExitHandler
    Default exit handler that calls System.exit().
